table.name: vw_product_fee_type
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between product types and the fee types associated with them - related to ct_prod_fee_type
table.viewSql: SELECT cpft.prod_fee_type_id, cpft.status_id AS prod_fee_type_status_id, psr.code AS prod_fee_type_status_code, cpt.product_type_id, cpt.code AS product_type_code, cpt.name AS product_type_name, cpt.description AS product_type_description, cpt.status_id AS product_type_status_id, psp.code AS product_type_status_code, cft.fee_type_id, cft.code AS fee_type_code, cft.name AS fee_type_name, cft.description AS fee_type_description, cft.prorate, cft.price, cft.status_id AS fee_type_status_id, psf.code AS fee_type_status_code FROM (((((ct_product_type cpt JOIN pt_status psp ON ((cpt.status_id = psp.status_id))) JOIN ct_prod_fee_type cpft ON ((cpt.product_type_id = cpft.product_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON ((cpft.status_id = psr.status_id))) JOIN ct_fee_type cft ON ((cft.fee_type_id = cpft.fee_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psf ON ((cpft.status_id = psf.status_id)));

column.name: prod_fee_type_id
column.remarks: prod_fee_type_id identifier of the product-fee type relation (field prod_fee_type_id from ct_prod_fee_type table)

column.name: prod_fee_type_status_id
column.remarks: Status id of the product-fee type relation (field status_id from ct_prod_fee_type table)

column.name: prod_fee_type_status_code
column.remarks: Status code of the product-fee type relation

column.name: product_type_id
column.remarks: Product_type_id for the product-fee type relation (field product_type_id from ct_product_type table)

column.name: product_type_code
column.remarks: Code for the product type (field code from ct_product_type table)

column.name: product_type_name
column.remarks: Name for the product type (field name from ct_product_type table)

column.name: product_type_description
column.remarks: Description for the product type (field description from ct_product_type table)

column.name: product_type_status_id
column.remarks: Status_id for the product type (field status_id from ct_product_type table)

column.name: product_type_status_code
column.remarks: Status code for the product_type

column.name: fee_type_id
column.remarks: Fee_type_id for the product-fee type relation (field fee_type_id from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: fee_type_code
column.remarks: Code for the fee type (field code from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: fee_type_name
column.remarks: Name for the fee type (field name from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: fee_type_description
column.remarks: Description for the fee type (field description from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: prorate
column.remarks: Flag that indicates if the fee type is prorated (true) or not (false)(field prorate from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: price
column.remarks: Price for the fee type (field price from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: fee_type_status_id
column.remarks: Status_id for the fee type (field status_id from ct_fee_type table)

column.name: fee_type_status_code
column.remarks: Status code for the fee type

table.name: vw_product_service_type
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between product types and the service types associated with them - related to ct_prod_serv_type
table.viewSql: SELECT cpst.prod_serv_type_id, cpst.status_id AS prod_serv_type_status_id, psr.code AS prod_serv_type_status_code, cpt.product_type_id, cpt.code AS product_type_code, cpt.name AS product_type_name, cpt.description AS product_type_description, cpt.status_id AS product_type_status_id, psp.code AS product_type_status_code, cst.service_type_id, cst.code AS service_type_code, cst.name AS service_type_name, cst.description AS service_type_description, cst.status_id AS service_type_status_id, pss.code AS service_type_status_code FROM (((((ct_product_type cpt JOIN pt_status psp ON ((cpt.status_id = psp.status_id))) JOIN ct_prod_serv_type cpst ON ((cpt.product_type_id = cpst.product_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON ((cpst.status_id = psr.status_id))) JOIN ct_service_type cst ON ((cst.service_type_id = cpst.service_type_id))) JOIN pt_status pss ON ((cst.status_id = pss.status_id)));

column.name: service_type_name
column.remarks: Name for the service type (field name from ct_service_type table)

column.name: service_type_description

table.name: vw_promo_consum_type_discount
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between promotion types and the fee types that can be discount by the promotion type - related to ct_promo_consum_type_discount
table.viewSql: SELECT cpctd.promo_consum_type_discount_id, cpctd.status_id AS promo_consum_type_disc_status_id, psr.code AS promo_consum_type_disc_status_code, cpctd.promotion_type_id, cpt.code AS promotion_type_code, cpt.name AS promotion_type_name, cpt.description AS promotion_type_description, cpt.discount_type_id, pdt.code AS discount_type_code, pdt.name AS discount_type_name, pdt.description AS discount_type_description, cpt.discount_value AS promotion_type_discount_value, cpt.status_id AS promotion_type_status_id, psp.code AS promotion_type_status_code, cpctd.consumption_type_id, cct.code AS consumption_type_code, cct.name AS consumption_type_name, cct.description AS consumption_type_description, cct.consumption_class_id, pcc.code AS consumption_class_code, pcc.name AS consumption_class_name, pcc.description AS consumption_class_description, cct.status_id AS consumption_type_status_id, psc.code AS consumption_type_status_code FROM (((((((ct_promotion_type cpt JOIN pt_status psp ON ((psp.status_id = cpt.status_id))) JOIN ct_promo_consum_type_discount cpctd ON ((cpt.promotion_type_id = cpctd.promotion_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON ((cpctd.status_id = psr.status_id))) JOIN pt_discount_type pdt ON ((pdt.discount_type_id = cpt.discount_type_id))) JOIN ct_consumption_type cct ON ((cct.consumption_type_id = cpctd.consumption_type_id))) JOIN pt_consumption_class pcc ON ((pcc.consumption_class_id = cct.consumption_class_id))) JOIN pt_status psc ON ((psc.status_id = cct.status_id))) WHERE (cpt.application_level_id IN ( SELECT pal2.application_level_id FROM pt_application_level pal2 WHERE ((pal2.code)::text = 'SERV'::text)));

column.name: promo_consum_type_discount_id
column.remarks: promo_consum_type_discount_id identifier of the promotion-consumption discount type relation (field promo_consum_type_discount_id from ct_promo_consum_type_discount table)

column.name: promo_consum_type_disc_status_id
column.remarks: Status id of the promotion-consumption discount type relation (field status_id from ct_prod_prom_type table)

column.name: promo_consum_type_disc_status_code
column.remarks: Status code of the promotion-consumption discount type relation

column.name: promotion_type_id

table.name: vw_promotion_fee_type_discount
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between promotion types and the fee types that can be discount by the promotion type - related to ct_promo_fee_type_discount
table.viewSql: SELECT cpfdt.promo_fee_type_discount_id, cpfdt.status_id AS promo_fee_type_disc_status_id, psr.code AS promo_fee_type_disc_status_code, cpt.promotion_type_id, cpt.code AS promotion_type_code, cpt.name AS promotion_type_name, cpt.description AS promotion_type_description, cpt.application_level_id, pal.code AS application_level_code, cpt.discount_type_id, pdt.code AS discount_type_code, pdt.name AS discount_type_name, pdt.description AS discount_type_description, pal.description AS application_level_description, cpt.discount_value AS promotion_type_discount_value, cpt.status_id AS promotion_type_status_id, psp.code AS promotion_type_status_code, cft.fee_type_id, cft.code AS fee_type_code, cft.name AS fee_type_name, cft.description AS fee_type_description, cft.prorate, cft.price, cft.status_id AS fee_type_status_id, psf.code AS fee_type_status_code FROM (((((((ct_promotion_type cpt JOIN pt_status psp ON ((cpt.status_id = psp.status_id))) JOIN pt_application_level pal ON ((cpt.application_level_id = pal.application_level_id))) JOIN pt_discount_type pdt ON ((pdt.discount_type_id = cpt.discount_type_id))) JOIN ct_promo_fee_type_discount cpfdt ON ((cpt.promotion_type_id = cpfdt.promotion_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON (((cpfdt.status_id = psr.status_id) AND (cpt.application_level_id = cpfdt.application_level_id)))) JOIN ct_fee_type cft ON (((cft.fee_type_id = cpfdt.fee_type_id) AND (cft.application_level_id = cpfdt.application_level_id)))) JOIN pt_status psf ON ((cft.status_id = psf.status_id)));

table.name: vw_promotion_product_type
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between product types and the promotion types associated with them - related to ct_promo_prod_type
table.viewSql: SELECT cppt.promo_prod_type_id, cppt.status_id AS promo_prod_type_status_id, psr.code AS promo_prod_type_status_code, cpt.product_type_id, cpt.code AS product_type_code, cpt.name AS product_type_name, cpt.description AS product_type_description, cpt.status_id AS product_type_status_id, psp.code AS product_type_status_code, cpt2.promotion_type_id, cpt2.code AS promotion_type_code, cpt2.name AS promotion_type_name, cpt2.description AS promotion_type_description, cpt2.discount_type_id, pdt.code AS discount_code, pdt.name AS discount_name, pdt.description AS discount_description, cpt2.discount_value, cpt2.status_id AS promotion_type_status_id, psp2.code AS promotion_type_status_code FROM ((((((ct_product_type cpt JOIN pt_status psp ON ((cpt.status_id = psp.status_id))) JOIN ct_promo_prod_type cppt ON ((cpt.product_type_id = cppt.product_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON ((cppt.status_id = psr.status_id))) JOIN ct_promotion_type cpt2 ON ((cppt.promotion_type_id = cpt2.promotion_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psp2 ON ((cpt2.status_id = psp2.status_id))) JOIN pt_discount_type pdt ON ((pdt.discount_type_id = cpt2.discount_type_id)));

table.name: vw_promotion_service_type
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between service types and the promotion types associated with them - related to ct_promo_serv_type
table.viewSql: SELECT cpst.promo_serv_type_id, cpst.status_id AS prom_serv_type_status_id, psr.code AS prom_serv_type_status_code, cst.service_type_id, cst.code AS service_type_code, cst.name AS service_type_name, cst.description AS service_type_description, cst.status_id AS service_type_status_id, psp.code AS service_type_status_code, cpt.promotion_type_id, cpt.code AS promotion_type_code, cpt.name AS promotion_type_name, cpt.description AS promotion_type_description, cpt.discount_type_id, pdt.code AS discount_code, pdt.name AS discount_name, pdt.description AS discount_description, cpt.discount_value, cpt.status_id AS promotion_type_status_id, psp.code AS promotion_type_status_code FROM ((((((ct_service_type cst JOIN pt_status pss ON ((cst.status_id = pss.status_id))) JOIN ct_promo_serv_type cpst ON ((cst.service_type_id = cpst.service_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON ((cpst.status_id = psr.status_id))) JOIN ct_promotion_type cpt ON ((cpst.promotion_type_id = cpt.promotion_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psp ON ((cpt.status_id = psp.status_id))) JOIN pt_discount_type pdt ON ((pdt.discount_type_id = cpt.discount_type_id)));

table.name: vw_service_fee_type
table.remarks: View showing the relationship between service types and the fee types associated with them - related to ct_serv_fee_type
table.viewSql: SELECT csft.serv_fee_type_id, csft.status_id AS serv_fee_type_status_id, psr.code AS serv_fee_type_status_code, cst.service_type_id, cst.code AS service_type_code, cst.name AS service_type_name, cst.description AS service_type_description, cst.status_id AS service_type_status_id, pss.code AS service_type_status_code, cft.fee_type_id, cft.code AS fee_type_code, cft.name AS fee_type_name, cft.description AS fee_type_description, cft.prorate, cft.price, cft.status_id AS fee_type_status_id, psf.code AS fee_type_status_code FROM (((((ct_service_type cst JOIN pt_status pss ON ((cst.status_id = pss.status_id))) JOIN ct_serv_fee_type csft ON ((cst.service_type_id = csft.service_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psr ON ((csft.status_id = psr.status_id))) JOIN ct_fee_type cft ON ((cft.fee_type_id = csft.fee_type_id))) JOIN pt_status psf ON ((cst.status_id = psf.status_id)));

table.name: vw_users
table.viewSql: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_code, u.password, u.profile_id, p.profile_code FROM (it_users u JOIN it_profiles p ON ((u.profile_id = p.profile_id))) WHERE (u.active = true);
